title: How to Unblock Someone on WhatsApp: Step-by-Step Guide

steps.title: Open the WhatsApp app on your Android device.
steps.content: Open the WhatsApp app on your Android device. It's a green app that contains a white phone icon inside a white text bubble. WhatsApp is available for Android in the Google Play Store .

steps.title: Tap the ⁝ button in the upper-right corner of your screen.
steps.content: Tap the ⁝ button in the upper-right corner of your screen. A drop-down menu will open with more options.. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Settings at the bottom of the menu.
steps.content: Tap Settings at the bottom of the menu.

steps.title: Tap Account.
steps.content: Tap Account . This option has a key icon next to it. It will open your account settings.

steps.title: Tap Privacy.
steps.content: Tap Privacy . This will be at the very top, underneath Account .

steps.title: Tap Blocked contacts.
steps.content: Tap Blocked contacts . This option will show you the number of contacts you have blocked, and tapping on it will open up a list of all blocked contacts. If you don't see this option, tap Contacts first.

steps.title: Tap on the name of the contact you want to unblock.
steps.content: Tap on the name of the contact you want to unblock. The contact name will be above the phone number.

steps.title: Tap Unblock in the pop-up.
steps.content: Tap Unblock in the pop-up. This will be next to the phone number or contact name of the user. This person will now be able to call you and send you messages on WhatsApp. [2] X Research source You can also check if someone blocked you on WhatsApp.

steps.title: Open the WhatsApp app on your iPhone or iPad.
steps.content: Open the WhatsApp app on your iPhone or iPad. It's a green app that contains a white phone icon inside a white text bubble. If you don't have it already, you'll need to install WhatsApp . WhatsApp is available for iOS in the App Store .

steps.title: Tap the Settings button.
steps.content: Tap the Settings button. This button looks like a gear icon in the lower-right corner of your screen. It will take you to your WhatsApp Settings menu. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Account.
steps.content: Tap Account . This option has a blue key icon next to it. Tapping on it will open up your account settings.

steps.title: Tap Privacy.
steps.content: Tap Privacy . This will be at the very top, underneath Account .

steps.title: Tap Blocked.
steps.content: Tap Blocked . This option will show you the number of contacts you have blocked, and tapping on it will open up a list of all blocked contacts.

steps.title: Swipe left on a blocked contact on the list.
steps.content: Swipe left on a blocked contact on the list. You will see the option to Unblock to the right of your contact’s name.

steps.title: Tap Unblock.
steps.content: Tap Unblock . This is the red button that appears to the right of your contact’s name when you swipe left on it. Tapping on Unblock will remove the block. This person will now be able to call you and send you messages on WhatsApp. [4] X Research source Alternatively, you can tap on the blocked contact’s name on this list. This will bring up the Contact Info page for this person. Scroll down and tap Unblock (phone number) in red. You can easily block contacts again if needed.

steps.title: Log into the WhatsApp Web in a web browser.
steps.content: Log into the WhatsApp Web in a web browser. WhatsApp Web is supported in the latest versions of Chrome, Firefox, Opera, Safari, and Edge. You can also install the desktop client on PC or Mac. You will need to use your mobile device to use WhatsApp on a computer .

steps.title: Click the chat with the contact you want to unblock.
steps.content: Click the chat with the contact you want to unblock. This is where you can send messages .

steps.title: Click the contact's name.
steps.content: Click the contact's name. This will open the Contact info . [5] X Research source You can also click the three dots in the top-right corner to select Contact info .

steps.title: Click Unblock.
steps.content: Click Unblock . This will be in green next to the contact's phone number. [6] X Research source When using the desktop client, you can find Unblock in the Overview after clicking the contact's name. This person will now be able to call you and send you messages on WhatsApp.

steps.title: Do contacts get notified if I unblock them?
steps.content: Do contacts get notified if I unblock them? No, contacts will not receive a notification that you unblocked them. However, if they try to contact you, they'll see that their messages and calls are no longer blocked.

steps.title: How do I delete a blocked contact?
steps.content: How do I delete a blocked contact? If you want to delete a contact after blocking them, you'll need to delete them from your phone's address book or contact app. Blocking a contact won't automatically remove them for you. https://faq.whatsapp.com/1142481766359885/?cms_platform=web
